Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ann::mlp::mlp ( )
inline

MLP constructor. Builds a LUA/C++ object that represents a general MLP. You could add layers, connections and actions in a free manner.

Parameters
bunch_sizeIs the mini-batch (or bunch) size. Is used to enhance the efficiency of the system. A tipical value is 32.
ann::mlp::~mlp ( lua_State *  L)
inline

Makes an exact deep copy of the object.

void ann::mlp::mlp_open_constructor ( lua_State *  L)
void ann::mlp::randomize_weights ( )
inline

Initializes the weights using a random numbers generator and an optional inferior and superior interval values.

Parameters
randomA random number generator, instance of MTRand (random in LUA)
infInferior bound of the interval. By default is -0.7.
supSuperior bound of the interval. By default is 0.7.

inline

Show at stdout weights values: for debugging.
